title: Do 16 countries use voting machines from "Sorros Watch? "
subtitle: The Daily Caller lied and falsely reported that 16 states would use voting machines controlled by a company with deep ties to George Soros.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: George Soros controls the Smartmatics, which makes the voting machines used in 16 critical states, and those states will be equipped for Hillary Clinton.
